# JsonBoxClient.UpdateAsync method

Update an existing record.

```csharp
public Task<string> UpdateAsync(string id, string json)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| id | The ID of the record to update. |
| json | The updated JSON object. |

## Return Value

A status message as a JSON object.
